reviews.text: Getting there early in the morning is a nightmare. Ticket machine is never working. Doors are locked to toilets etc. By early I only mean 7:30. Needs sorting out!
I frequently travel from this station and each time I have never been delayed. The shop is extremely helpful as there is no shop near to the station and overall the station has good facilities.
Small station with a coffee shop and waiting rooms. Just what you would expect from a town

Scunthorpe, one of this station on the South Humberside route. New departure screens have appeared in White to make them easier to read, as other people have mentioned the only let down is the disability aspect as there’s a full blown footbridge for abled people, but no lifts. Disabled need to request assistance to use the foot crossing on the far side of the station.
